name: Farm2Fast
description:
How to Play

- You have to harvest crop as much as you can untill time runout. You have to use Hoe fisrt before seed pouch and waiting , sometime plant need water ,You have to watering it with watering can. If you can harvest in time or let plant die You will lost score. If you play singleplay you have objective to do . If you can't do it all in time you still Lost that game.

* Player 1

- use W A S D - >  movement 

- left Shift - >  change tool

- spacebar - > use tool

* Player 2

- use Arrow - >  movement

- right Shift - > change tool

-  enter -> use tool

Game Made In Thailand

Project in University.
